text.language: Emmanou/l Pennou]: qen tenm/] ]nou: qen p~w~ou n~te Pefiwt: nem Pip#n#a# e#y#u#.
Immanuel our God, is now in our midst, with the glory of His Father, and the Holy Spirit.

language.div: Imanuel Allah kita, sekarang di tengah kita, dengan kemuliaan Bapa-Nya, dan Roh Kudus.

text.language: عمانوئيل إلهنا فى وسطنا الآن بمجد أبيه والروح القدس.
